NOTES
  • this is a hacky tool to convert lorem ipsum text into JSON
  • we need well formed JSON for the lorem ipsum library to work
  • TO DO: find a much better way to do this...
HOW TO
  • get 20 or so paragraphs from lorem ipsum generator of your choice
  • run the text through http://www.word2text.com or a similar site
  • copy and paste the resulting text below (it will split on new lines for new paragraphs and periods for sentences)
  • press convert and copy the result into roughdraft.thesaurus.json
  • some editing may be required (search/fix "." and "Mr."/"Mrs." etc)
